snippet: The U.S. Tennis Association has joined in the partnership launching the new Laver Cup team competition and will help stage the second edition of the event in the United States in 2018....
lead_paragraph: The U.S. Tennis Association has joined in the partnership launching the new Laver Cup team competition and will help stage the second edition of the event in the United States in 2018.

headline.print_headline: Second Edition of Laver Cup to Be Staged in U.S.
headline.main: Second Edition of Laver Cup to Be Staged in U.S.
